Package evs4j

Interface Summary
Alert A marker interface for informational events of interest to some applications, see for example the MonitorConnection which tracks certain metrics for the Totem Single-Ring Protocol.
Configuration Interface for a processor 'configuration', also known in virtual synchrony circles as a 'view' or a 'group'.
Connection Connection objects are used to join/rejoin a group, to send messages, and to register a Listener object, which can receive messages.
Listener A Listener object performs processing of all incoming events, including new configurations, message delivery, and alerts.
Message Interface for totally-ordered messages.
 

Class Summary
ConnectionDecorator Useful for implementing chains of connections.
Processor Represents the idea of a sending and/or receiving process (or thread) in a configuration.
